title: Photo Shooting
description: A wedding is one of the most auspicious and special day in a person’s life. And photographing that day, to cherish the memories years after is something that any couple would expect in excellence, cause ‘Hey, you can’t have re-takes!’. I am providing Wedding Photography anywhere in Bangladesh. WEDSGRAPHY was established in 2008 with a vision to offer exceptional quality, service and value.My studio is based in Dhaka and you are invited to view my Wedding Photography Portfolio. Our meetings are by appointment only. Contact me today so i can show you why i am best and why so many couples are booking their wedding with me.

title: Video Shooting
description: I not only photographers, but the filmmakers. I document your precious moments on video. I make your wedding day even more special by creating a film for the bride, groom and glorious features, so you can live your best moments, again and again, after years of marriage. I provide panoramic featured film, candid photography, portraits, etc. I provide only quality work. I have a team of creative videograhers specializing in videography. I use only high-quality digital still and video cameras to improve my work. They have a voluminous experience in capturing and creating vivid videos that ensure a good end result. My studios is working to create the masterpiece of your captured memories. The videos, which my study is complete only with high definition camera that has the most advanced features in it. I offer a variety of wedding videography services Bangladesh and abroad.

title: Pre Wedding
description: Pre wedding photography is important, because the days are dear to both partners and even to their families. People want to cherish their days by capturing them and watch them again and again years later. A pre-wedding shoot is a great way to get acquainted with being in front of the camera. It is an ideal and fun time for us to get to know each other better and allows you to become familiar with the photographer.A pre shoot can be reserved in advance before the wedding day.This service is available with all wedding bookings. A pre shoot will typically last an hour on either a specific place you want your pictures to be taken, or alternatively I can recommend the best places for you to choose from.During the years of expertise and hard work, i have been successful in satisfying our customers with the finest high-end pre-wedding photography. So if you also want to turn the most precious moments of your wedding in a romantic saga, call me immediately, and i will serve you with great services and creative ideas of a unique pre-wedding photo shoot. I assure to gift you some exclusive masterpieces that you will treasure for a lifetime.
